Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server.socket

Class SocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server.socket.SocketClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, GameViewActions, MainViewActions, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class SocketClientHandler extends Client implements Runnable
This class will handle the communication with the client. Receiving command from the client and sending events to it.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method keeps waiting for reading commands from the client. If the received command is a GameCommand, after checking if the gameFlowManager is set, it is executed. If the received command is a MainCommand, it is directly executed. If exceptions are thrown, the loop is stopped and a new ClientHandler should be created (sending a new connection request to the socket server).
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • trasmitEvent

      public void trasmitEvent(MainEvent event) throws IOException
      This method will send a main event to the client

      Throws:

    • update

      public void update(GameEvent event)
      This method handles received GameEvents This method update the client on changes on the game model on the server. This method is inherited from the Observer interface.

    • setGameServer

      public void setGameServer(GameServerActions gameServer) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to set the created game server once a game is started. (rmi) This method is not used in the socket implementation.
      Specified by:
      setGameServer in interface MainViewActions
      Parameters:

      Throws:
